  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600

          text run at (0,0) width 288: "The caption should be at the bottom of the table"

            text run at (51,0) width 61: "Wild Cats"
